title: Amadeus Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Long standing restaurant with a farm-to-table menu, which as a separate section with vegetarian food including its signature hummus, as well as salads, apps, risottos, vegan torta, ratatouille, seasonal veggie plates. More upscale environment and accommodating to vegans.
